General.Name: Fujian MinDong Electric Power Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Fujian Mindong Electric Power Limited Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production of hydropower and wind power in China. It is also involved in the production and supply of gas and water; railway transportation; investment in banking, securities, trust, guarantee, and venture capital; investment in agriculture, forestry, hospitality, and mining businesses; real estate development; and asset management activities. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Ningde, China.
General.Address: Building 1, Dongsheng Taili Garden, Ningde, China, 352100
